resources.string: anon. networks are only open when you are inside the area. Once inside the network, hit the key and we will log you in.
Geofence service is not available now
Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now
Geofence transition error: invalid transition type %1$d
Click notification to return to app
Enable location services to see posts around you within the Wits network.
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
You are inside %1$s. Hit the key to enter this network.
Welcome to anon. We are logging you in with temp details to check out the feed and post anonymously.

Code of conduct: 

1. Be yourself. No one here cares about followers.
2. Post what's on your mind, judgement free.
3. Don't fuck it up for others! If your posts are continually reported, you will be suspended.
4. Do not post people‚Äôs private information. Ever. Not cool.
5. Check out our terms and privacy policy.
6. Click "Let me in" to agree to the above
Please check that you\'ve submitted information correctly. We\'re having trouble logging you in.
Create an account to show your gender.
Do not show gender for this post.
Choose the mood for this post.
You may choose to display or hide your gender on each post.
we need your email to keep your account secure. It will always remain hidden.
So you don\'t have to go through the temp sign-in every time. What a bore.
You need to enter an email address to create an account.
Your password isn\'t long enough. Use at least 8 characters.
Complete all fields before signing up.
We need to know your gender, use the flower if you don\'t want to be specific.
This email address is associated to another account.
Your message is too long. Max 140 characters allowed.
Your account was deleted by some reason, sorry. We will redirect you to log in page once again.
Hi, Sorry if someone said something that offended you. We want you to be comfortable using the app so let us know what time it was posted and in which network the post was sent from.\n The Anon Team
All these posts will disappear in %1$s.
Your device could not send e-mail. Please check e-mail configuration and try again.
Snapshot of regions within Wits Braam campus
You will be logged out and have no access to posts if you are not in the network area.
What are you doing? Just log in.
Do not allow for live commentary.
Would you like to create an account to show your gender?
